name: Big Brain
description:
Welcome adventurer!

In this game, you’ll have to help Moshi, an alien, to conquer the UNIVERSE!!!! But you will have to proceed step by step because Moshi can only save two abilities at the time… Be the BIG BRAIN of the team to overcome these puzzles!

Controls for a Two-buttons Game jam:

• Click Right and Left to control Moshi depending of which abilities you have.
• Maintain right or left click to Replace an ability with another.
• Maintain one button then press the other to restart the level.

Good Luck adventurer!

Programming: Benoit TOTH
Art: Laetitia BRUN
Music: Sd_bbb by Patricia Taxxon
Thanks to François for his voice

Made with Unity
